outside1.description: You are outside leaning against a big tree. You see a locked green gate to the south.

look.big tree: There is a large hollow staring at you.
look.large hollow: There appears to be a doorknob inside the hollow!
look.doorknob: You should try to use it and see what happens.
look.green gate: Maybe a green key would unlock the gate.

outside1.unlocked.description: You are outside leaning against a big tree. You see an unlocked green gate to the south and a locked blue gate behind it.

look.big tree: There is a large hollow staring at you.
look.large hollow: There appears to be a doorknob inside the hollow!
look.doorknob: You should try to use it and see what happens.
look.blue gate: Maybe a blue key would unlock the gate.

outside1.unlocked2.description: You are outside leaning against a big tree. You see an unlocked green gate to the south and an unlocked blue gate behind it.

look.big tree: There is a large hollow staring at you.
look.large hollow: There appears to be a doorknob inside the hollow!
look.doorknob: You should try to use it and see what happens.

outside2.description: You are in a clearing outside. You see trails leading north and west and a locked orange gate to the south.

look.orange gate: Maybe an orange key would unlock the gate.

outside2.unlocked.description: You are in a clearing outside. You see trails leading north and west and an unlocked orange gate to the south and a locked purple gate behind it.

look.purple gate: Maybe a purple key would unlock the gate.

outside2.unlocked2.description: You are in a clearing outside. You see trails leading north and west and an unlocked orange gate to the south and an unlocked purple gate behind it.

outside3.description: You are in a clearing outside on the edge of a swamp. There are cattails surrounding the swamp. You see a trail leading east.

look.cattails: You see a wooden door in the ground.
look.trapdoor: Maybe you should find out where it goes.

outside4.description: You see a purple house. Congratulations! You win!
